reviews.review:
trash game
matching system is very fucked
Ranking system also fucked
이게 게임이냐. 버그 .핑. 매치 시간. 랭크보상없음 사면흑우

2019년 03월 쯤 
게임 참 잘만드셨네요 메튜 장수 기원!
꼭 사세요!


--------------------------------------------------------------
2020년 04월 29일 
매튜가 패치를 했다. 
벌써 게임이 나온지 3년이 넘었는데 아직도 킬러가 판자에 낀다.
허공을 가르는 그의 칼날이 애처롭기 그지없다. 

그리고 펭민이의... 가장... 예쁜... 스킨이... 생얼이 되었다. 

또 불토가 불타지않는다고 한다. 
톱구는 애드온이 적용이 되지 않는다고 한다.
톰슨가 저택 큰집에 투명 벽 버그가 있어 결계가 생겼고,
갈고리에 구출된 뒤 바로 달리기가 되지 않는 버그가 있다.

아 시계가 터진 생존자를 치료할때 수리중이라고 뜨는 버그는 고친것같다.^^ 

토끼 허밍소리 추격시 초기화가 안되고 거리가 멀어도 들린다.
또 2번째 갈고리에 걸렸을때 킬러의 심장소리 구분이 안되는건 여전하다.

--------------------------------------------------------------
2021년 05월 13일

아직까지 내가 데바데를 하고있다.
알트탭을하면 7191시간을 투자한 뒤였다.
오늘은 노움이벤트라고 엔드게임이 시작되면 난쟁이한마리가 나오는데 
그걸 발로차면 하찮고 귀여운 부적을 주었다.
노움을 갖지못해 막걸인데도 못나가는 사람도 보았다.

또 오늘은 랭초날인데, 13일 6시가 넘었는데도 아직도 난 1랭이다.
보니까 누구라곤 못하지만 1 -> 9랭으로 떡락한 사람도 있더라

저번주엔 창문넘고 판자넘는 게임에서 판자를 넘어도 반대쪽에서 칼이 날아오더라
분명 다 넘어서 킬러 반대쪽인데 칼질을하면 맞았다.

--------------------------------------------------------------
2021년 10월 20일

신 생존자 미카엘라가 나왔다. 
호재퍽은 사실 베타에서 세르게이인줄 알았으나 공방에서하니까 개사기퍽이였다.
근데 호재를 넘 열심히하니까 게임이 나가졌다... 한 3판 걸러 팅긴다고 보면된다.
적당히 호재 쓰라는거 같다. 나포함 우리팀에 호재가 3명쯤되고 시작해서 
루인이 호재로 바뀌는게 흔한 풍경이여따. 가끔 킬러가 호재를 보고도 안부시는 킬러도 있어서
계속 같은곳을 돌아도 잡지못하는 웃긴 풍경도 나왔다. 아무래도 호재는 분명 너프각이다.
다음 패치때 너프가 되지않는다면 내 성을... 그럼 엄마아빠한테 혼난다. 
너프는 아마 될거다. 생존자끼리 협동도 잘된다. 호재 만들어졌던 토템위치가 공유되서 
솔직히 한방도 무용지물이된다. 그전 토템위치만 기억하면 아무것도 못한다. 

그리고 현재 아직까지 솔큐를 하고있다면... 당신은 진정한 인내심킹.... 어캐 참누..
솔큐는 걍 하지말라는거 같다. 왜냐면 솔큐는 거의 땜빵이다. 이곳저곳 불려가서 
빈자리를 야무지게 채워준다. 3외국인은 기본이고 지구본한테도 끌려간다. 
MMR이 도입되고 킬러는 오히려 줄었다. 생존자는 힘들어지고.. 이유는 모르겠다. 
암튼 듀오정도까지만해도 고통에서 벗어나니 듀오이상을 추천한다...
애초에 매튜도 다인큐를 밀어주는게 분명하다. 그리고 심지어 다인큐는 즐겁기라도함... ^.^
그리고 너스는 왜 3블을 돌려준지 노이해다 ㄹㅇ 바보들인가.... 
그럼 오늘 일기는 여기까지.

매튜야!!! 이게 게임이냐!!!! 
잘좀 하자~ ^^
이 게임 할인해도 사지마라 매칭시스템 개 아작나서 목표감 채우는 재미 1도 없다
อัพเดทแพทล่าสุดแล้วเข้าเกมส์ไม่ได้คือเซ่งมาก
매칭이 안됨 대기타임 기본 10분 정도

・致命的なバグ（一部アドオンの無効化など）を半年以上放置しています。
・サイレントナーフをアップデートのたびにしています。
・最近実装されたマッチングシステムがキラーをする場合、今までならすぐに部屋を建てられたのが3分以上待たないと建てられません。もしかしたら運営はわざと待たせているのかも......（サバイバーは1分ほどで部屋に入ることができるようです。）
・マッチング自体も初心者が上級者の部屋に入れられます。逆の場合もあります。これはサバイバーキラー関係ありません。すべてごちゃまぜです。
・対戦ゲームであるから仕方ありませんが煽り行為が多発しています。初心者キラーがVCPTプレイしている人たちに煽られていることは日常茶飯事です。切断行為にもペナルティはありません。
・ランキングシステムもあるのですが、上に上がっても特に報酬はありません。マッチングシステム改悪でもはや無意味です。
・ランキングの査定もかなり厳しくなり私の腕前ではサバイバーは現状維持がやっとです。（もちろんうまくて運もある人たちは上に上がれますが）
・もともとこのゲームはVC非推奨のはずです。サバイバー4人はそのように制限された状態で協力したり蹴落としあったりして脱出するゲームのはずです。ですがそういったコンセプトはすでに崩壊しています。運営もランキングマッチの時はVCが一切使えない状況にして、フレンドと話しながらプレイしたい人たちをカジュアルマッチに移動させればいいのですが、おそらくそのような技術力もありませんしあったとしても面倒くさがってしないでしょう。
・一番このゲームで眉間にしわを寄せているのは野良専サバイバーです。理由としては開発がなぜかPTを相手にすることを前提でキラーを強化するのでよっぽどの熟練者かニュータイプでなければ厳しいものがあります。

私自身このゲームは大好きです。本来のコンセプトや世界観は非常に素晴らしいものです。覚えることは多いですが操作自体は（一部のキラーを除く）簡単でホラーゲームが苦手な方でもとっつきやすいものです。
しかし多くのバグや開発の運営能力の低さがあだとなっておりプレイ人口は減りつつあります。今年の夏に専用サーバーに移行すると開発は明言していますがそれまでに十分な人口が残っているのかはなはだ疑問ではあります。
なので今から買おうかなと考えている方はしばらくはやめておいたほうがいいと思います。今の状態では人に自信をもって勧められるゲームではありません。

Butchers don't keep chasing a man to fight, and don't try to kill the last one. A talk of human experience by a red butcher.

데발진에게
글을 쓰는 이유는 더이상 유저들을 기만하지 마라
유저들은 데바데에 많은 문제점을 참고 이해하고 있다.

1.애미뒤진 매칭시스템 이 개새끼들 게임은 해보고  패치하는건가 싶다 
이새끼들 월급이랑 퇴근시간에도 대기시간걸고 매튜기분 초핑일때만 받거나 퇴근시켜야함.
2.업데이트마다 발생하는 병신같은 버그 수정하려고 하는지도 모르겠음.
3.맨날 똑같은 이벤트 차라리 날 데려다 써 시발
4.퍽이 몇갠데 개 좆같은 퍽들좀 리뉴얼해라 또 살인마 밸런스, 이새끼들이 김치식 매운맛 너스피릿을 안당해봐서그런가
5.번역은 개새끼들아 내가 구글번역기로해도 이거보단 잘 할 것 같아
운영 개씨발 못하는 좆병신게임. 버그 절대 안고침 하지마셈 차라리 돈슨게임을 해

And i will say this from bottom of my heart,i mean every single words: i think we have done pretty good job so far.
Ohhhhhhhh~ yes! Well done!

Très bon jeux pour jouer avec des amis , possibilité de beaucoup de rire si l'une des personnes est stressé ou a peur. Plusieurs possibilité de style de jeu aussi: la personne qui veux aider tout le monde, la personne qui joues Solo, Le pro réparateur, la personne confiance en ses "skills" pour être l'obsession du tueur, ect.

Le mode solo (Tueur) est aussi amusant et le temps passe assez vite. Malgré le fais d'avoir qu'un seul but à accomplir, vous avez d'autre disponibilité a votre disposition pour gagné.

It's not funny

killer is Garbage

Net code has been broken for 3 years. Horribly unbalanced perk system. Killers released are argragiously broken. Survivors are shafted on release via the amount of benefits a killer has to track them. Killers get a benefit of unfairly placed hooks that are so vast in numbers and close by each other that the basic “wiggle” mechanic is useless.

This game is a mesochists dream. Everything about it will aggravate you to the bloody core. I regret the money I put down for the this game, and if you ever catch me on it, it’s playing customs. That’s the only place you can actually have fun.

Fuck this game. Fuck this company.

ゲームの世界観云々を言えば、「ロビーを探す」が「試合を検索」に変更されて、はっきり言って興ざめです。
配信者がたまに「試合」と表現しますが、このゲームでは「儀式」だったはずです。
バグ、バランス、世界観、すべてひどい状況だと言わざるを得ない。

*Recent update made this game unplayable. It takes huge amount of time to play the game, while the reward is unworthy. The new character is somewhat nasty. You cannot feel the fear toward the new character. It is just disgusting.

The game more like hide-and-seek rather than horror game. Nonetheless, it has creepy and disgusting objects that you don't want to see.

As a hide-and-seek game, Dead by Daylight provides an excellent experience, even though it has some huge imbalance between the killers. 

The reason why I do not recommend this game is that it takes so much time to play. I mean queue to join the game is way too long; more than 5 min, for starter if you want to play the killer until 15 rank or so. After the recent update, it is hard to climb the rank.

スラッシャー映画モチーフの非対称対戦ゲームとしては屈指の出来「でした」が
2019/3/22時点でこのタイトルをお勧めする事はできません。
原因は全てのプレイヤーが情報を共有できない事から成立していたこのゲームシステムにとって
致命的に相性の悪いSurvive With Friendsと外部アプリによるボイスチャットの併用による
ゲームコンセプトの破綻、更にこれらを使用するプレイヤー達によるキラー担当プレイヤーへの挑発行為、
それらを助長するキラー性能のナーフの数々やマッチングシステムの改悪、山積するバグ等
現在の環境は決してゲームを楽しめるものとはなっていません。
バグやバランス調整はともかく、SWF機能の閉鎖もしくはマッチング時のSWF可視化・拒否設定さえあれば
プレイヤーのモラルによる問題の殆どは解決するのが実に残念な話です。
메튜야 이게 게임이냐?

trash
良いゲーム

As I've enjoyed so many games at Steam until now, I never wrote any comment about any game, but this time, I must say something. I tried to understand, but the result of recent patch was a disaster.

I started to play from Jan 2019, sometimes bugs occured, but acceptable.

Only the matter is the terrible MATCHING SYSTEM. Not after recent patch, but also before it already was.

Did you guys, The Developers, have any experience, playing over 200, 300, 400, 500, 600ms room?

How do you feel? Do you want to play this game?
I want to play under clean server environment, realtime motion reflecting my own will which makes this game fun
by co-working with other survivors, catching survivors, evading narrowly.

At severe server environment as I referred above, killer and survivors both teleport long distances.
As a survivor, I thought I evade the killers attack and then hit.

Inter-playing with other continents' guys is good, but server environment is the only and the first obejct for fun to play this game.

Trying 30 times for a match with clean server environ(maybe 30~150ms)
makes me crazy.

Which one do you prefer?
playing with other remote countries' guys over 500ms room VS. with near countries' guys 30~150ms room

I really like this game and don't want to be a DBDphobe.
매칭

게임이 재미있긴한데 최근에 업데이트하고 나서 씹창 난듯. 칼찌 너프 전까지만 플레이하고 최근에 신살인마 나왔다해서 다시 복귀했는데 바뀐게 너무 많아서 답답함. 칼찌는 확실히 너프되서 엔듀링 있으면 쓰레기 됬고 매칭 시스템은 완전 이상해짐. 생존자하면 10랭 12랭들이 20랭짜리 살인마랑 매칭이됨. 20랭짜리 덫구는 퍽도 2개끼고 있었고 덫을 어케 까는지도 모르는 플레이언데, 애를 10랭 애들이랑 매칭시키면 당연히 능욕당하지. 생존자 갈고리에 걸어서 죽이면 그 갈고리 다시 못쓰는것도 모르는 애였는데. 매칭 시스템 다시 바꿔야할듯.
Mang game

Last 30 hours i played in DBD. 80% of the killers had 300+ ping, 10% of killers left the lobby right after i joined game, and 9% of the killers left the game right after it started. GG Dont know what happened. Playing DBD now like hour and half, 6killers disconnected right after game, 3 killers 300+ ping in lobby. Good job :) 
But i would still recommend because i like the game, but killers like these need to get banned.

As a rank 1 survivor and killer I can say that they gear this game a lot more towards killers, making it a lot easier for them, while surviving is full of face campers and tunnelers ruining the whole atmosphere of the game. 

Also with the influx of new streamers it makes surviving even more difficult as the demand for content is prioritized over playing the game, which obviously I understand, but if you're a solo player it will get pretty annoying between that and the crappy wanna be rank 1 killers.

It is a fun game and I do enjoy playing it, I'm just hoping this comment prepares you for whats to come.

패치 2.6.4로 포인트 시스템이 적당한 수준으로 바뀌었습니다. 개발진이 말도 안되던 포인트 시스템을 고쳐줘서 고맙고, 떠났던 유저들이 다시 돌아오길 바랍니다. 이제는 개발진은 인게임 버그랑 무한로딩 현상을 고치는 데 전념해야 할 것 같습니다. 저는 이 리뷰를 긍정적으로 방금 바꿨습니다.


=========================================================================

March 21, 2019

As of v. 2.6.1, this game is a joke. 
The Dev. team should FIX so many in-game bugs, and sw crash issues first then think of the PIP system. 
Who brought up this nonsense PIP system idea? 
If the Dev. team thinks the new PIP works fine then why don't you just remove this ridiculous rank system - get rid of the numbers!!
The game is now so stressful and frustrating to play without getting enough rewards.
(unhooked 2 survivors, healed 1 crawled survivor, ran 2.5 gens, cleansed 1 Hex totem, hooked 2wice, opened a gate, escaped = 0 PIP HAHAHA!)
I do not recommend this game until they rollback or fix this RIDICULOUS PIP system.

I DO NOT THINK YOU DID A GOOD JOB SO FAR!

패치 2.6.1은 정말 최악입니다.
개발진은 인게임 버그나 게임 크래쉬 문제부터 해결하고 포인트 시스템을 건들이시오!
대체 누가 이딴 포인트 시스템 아이디어를 생각해 냈습니까?
개발진이 새로운 포인트 시스템이 괜찮다고 생각한다면, 랭크시스템을 - 숫자 - 아예없애 버렸음 좋겠습니다.
지금 이 게임은 플레이한 것에 비해서 보상이 없어서 스트레스 받고 짜증만 납니다.
- 갈고리에서 2명 구출, 엎어진 애 힐, 발전기 2.5개 돌림, 루인 파괴, 갈고리 2번 걸림, 문열고, 탈출 = 0 포인트 이게 말이됨? -
이번 패치를 롤백하던가, 말도 안되는 이 포인트 시스템을 고칠 때까지 저는 이 게임을 비추합니다.

Ta, vamos la.

Pra começar o game já está começando a falir, não duvido nada que daqui as uns meses esteja sem players... E não é pra pouco, tirando o fato de vc ficar no lobby infinito procurando partida, e quando acha são partidas lagadas ou que o killer acaba de camperando, dentro do game só piora ainda. O game é todo cheio de bugs, os gráficos são lamentaveis pra um jogo dessa geração e a jogabilidade não apresenta nada de inovador. 

Você ira presenciar bugs que irão unicamente te prejudicar e verá que os desenvolvedores do jogos são totalmente parciais, lançando sempre atualizações que prejudicam apenas um lado dos jogadores, entre Sobreviventes/Killers.
Enfim, é lamentável que ainda tenha sim pessoas que joguem essa merda, não recomendo pra ninguem, tenho muitas horas de jogo mas pode contar que eram antes, anos atrás, onde o jogo realmente se focava em ser balanceado e não apenas ganhar dinheiro em cima de Dlcs apressadas e sem graça. Enfim

Came back to this game for Pyramid Head and I have to say I'm genuinely impressed: the literal exact same problems that have existed for four years are still plaguing this game. Survivor matches are boring as sin because the Killer is a non-threat, and Killer is beyond frustrating since any competent team will easily win with you getting one kill at best. (By facecamping.)

Maps are too big and it's literally impossible to play any character who doesn't have mobility: I will save everyone who wants to play Killer in this game the trouble and tell you that the only Killers worth playing are The Spirit, The Nightmare (Freddy Krueger), or The Oni. There's only maybe 10 total perks that are good for either side and every other perk from every other DLC is worthless. Again going to save people the trouble and tell them exactly what DLCs to buy now:
[quote][h1]Killer[/h1]
[list]
[*]Leatherface (BBQ & Chili)
[*]Curtain Call (Pop Goes the Weasel / Bamboozle - Just buy Clown in-game with Iridescent Shards)
[/list]
And maybe watch the shrine for the handful of other meta Killer perks.

[h1]Survivor[/h1]
The literal only DLC you need to be competitively viable as Survivor is the [b]Halloween[/b] DLC for Laurie Strode's perk Decisive Strike. Every other meta perk for Survivors (Adrenaline, Spine Chill, Iron Will, Unbreakable, various speed boost perks that cause the Exhaustion effect) are available for free with the base game.[/quote]
[b]Literally every other DLC is [u]worthless[/u] and you are [u]actively harming your experience[/u] by purchasing it.[/b] (Since you dilute your bloodweb with garbage perks.)

For a list of things that they need to change in Dead by Daylight to make me come back:
[olist][*]Change the maps so you don't need a character who specifically has a power to move around the map fast in order to be viable. Remove like 40% of the dead space on all the maps. (Or give every Killer a Last Year-esque "phasing mode" where they move at like 300% ms)
[*]Rework or outright remove the Bloodweb system. Being competitively viable should not be tied to RNG. Just let players buy the perks and addons they want; you can still tie Prestige to BP expenditure but at least players can invest in items / perks / addons that they want and actually have fun before deciding to Prestige.
[*]Actually fucking nerf perks / tactics / items / addons / offerings that have been meta for four years running: BBQ, NOED, tunneling, Borrowed Time, Decisive Strike, Iron Will, Spine Chill, Adrenaline, Exhaustion perks, Keys, Moris, various Ultra Rares for various Killers...
[spoiler][b]3.1.[/b] And stop doing stupidly heavy-handed nerfs like with Billy and Nurse.[/spoiler]
[spoiler][b]3.2.[/b] Add various perks that should be part of the base kit to the base kit: Decisive Strike (anti-tunneling perk), Unbreakable, BBQ (detection), Pop Goes, Thanataphobia (being injured should have more of a penalty), Whispers, Overcharge (stop Survivors from tapping a gen that was kicked), Unnerving Presence (stop Survivors from doing gens in the Killer's face), Spies from the Shadows, Bloodhound...[/spoiler]
[spoiler]3.3. STOP ADDING MORE FUCKING SECOND CHANCE PERKS TO THE GAME HOLY SHIT[/spoiler]
[*]Fix all the fucking bugs that have been in the game for four years running.
[*]Fix the fucking matchmaking so that the average skill gap between players isn't as wide as the Mariana trench.[/olist]

I finally remove this game from my ps4 and pc, and it is the best day of my life for a while. this game sux now in all aspects.
- It is too killer sided now
- emblem system is almost impossible to pip unless u rush to do every single things against each other survivors
- the survivors are now looking to race each other on emblem points than perform as a team, even with SWF everyone just rush to the hook without thinking to utilized the time to achieve the common goal
- Too easy to play killer and too hard to play survivor
- Not fun at all
- Spend you time and money for other better games out there

Ok

Dead By Daylight is a pretty fun game if you like to play as a survivor. At this point the game is varied because you can face against any killer as you attempt to fix generators and get out of dodge. On the other hand there is a limited amount of killers with the base game and to unlock more you have to pay for the more interesting ones like Mike Meyers and The Doctor. Unlocking them all will take around $60 or so. I still recommend the game for its base price though some matches are hit or miss.

The whole game idea is based on mental decisions and fair/unfair gameplay styles.

Death by experience. The players of the old, hold the new player in the palm of their hand. Strangling every last drop out of this hopeful who arrives to play a fun game only to be chased down over and over to no end. With fellow new players not knowing what to do, ignoring objectives and having their teammates slowly fall prey. Those few hiding in a corner to be the last one standing. With no avail only to drop dead by the experienced player.  Great game to view and watch but not fun to play in the slightest.
